Peter Lind Hayes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Lind_Hayes 0 Peter Lind Hayes (born Joseph Conrad Lind; June 25, 1915 – April 21, 1998) was an American vaudeville entertainer, songwriter, and film and television actor. Peter_Lind_Hayes ( born Joseph_Conrad_Lind ; June_25_,_1915 – April_21_,_1998 ) was an_American_vaudeville_entertainer , songwriter , and film_and_television_actor .
